description: This file declares the IEventHandler interface for handling OCI container events within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. It defines methods for events such as container start, stop, failure, and state change, all passing container name and JSON data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface for handling OCI container lifecycle events.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container has started.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container has stopped.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container has failed.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container's state changes.
